meta.description: All quotes, wisdoms, iconic quotes, and Jamaican Bible scriptures (KJV + Patois) for use in Flutter or other clients.

quotes.patois: Every mickle mek a muckle
quotes.english: Every small amount adds up to something big.

quotes.patois: Wah sweet nanny goat a go run him belly
quotes.english: What seems good now might have bad consequences later.

quotes.patois: No cut off yuh nose fi spile yuh face
quotes.english: Don't act in anger to your own detriment.

quotes.patois: Chicken merry, hawk deh near
quotes.english: Be careful even when things are going well.

quotes.patois: Wi likkle but wi tallawah
quotes.english: We are small, but we are mighty and strong.

quotes.patois: One one coco full basket
quotes.english: Success comes step by step.

quotes.patois: Ef yuh waan good, yuh nose haffi run
quotes.english: Success requires hard work and persistence.

quotes.patois: Cool yuhself, man
quotes.english: Stay calm and composed.

quotes.patois: Nuh true land cool, sanke nuh deh deh
quotes.english: Just because things look calm doesn't mean there's no danger.

quotes.patois: Walk wid yuh head high
quotes.english: Maintain your dignity and pride.

quotes.patois: Better fi shadow ketch yuh dan yuh ketch shadow
quotes.english: It's better to be prepared than to chase after things recklessly.

quotes.patois: Duppy know who fi frighten
quotes.english: Bullies only target those they think are weak.

quotes.patois: Soon come
quotes.english: Be patient, everything happens in its own time.

quotes.patois: A nuh everyting yuh ear yuh fi talk
quotes.english: Not everything you hear should be repeated.

quotes.patois: Tumble down nuh mean seh yuh stop
quotes.english: Falling down doesn't mean you stop trying.

quotes.patois: Nuh mek yuh right hand know wah yuh left hand a do
quotes.english: Keep some things private, even from those closest to you.

quotes.patois: Stand tall like a Blue Mountain peak
quotes.english: Be proud and unwavering in who you are.

quotes.patois: Work hard, play hard, pray hard
quotes.english: Balance your effort, joy, and faith in life.

quotes.patois: Spirit a move, heart a groove
quotes.english: When your spirit is alive, your heart follows with joy.

quotes.patois: Yuh cyan tap a cloud from rain
quotes.english: You can't stop what's destined to happen.

quotes.patois: Rockstone a riva bottom nuh know sun hot
quotes.english: Those in comfortable positions don't understand the struggles of others.

quotes.patois: Trouble nuh set like rain
quotes.english: Problems can come without warning.

quotes.patois: Nuh dash weh yuh stick before yuh done cross di riva
quotes.english: Don't give up your support until you've finished what you started.

quotes.patois: Hard ears pickney nyam rockstone
quotes.english: Those who don't listen will learn the hard way.

quotes.patois: Di higher monkey climb, di more him expose
quotes.english: The more success you gain, the more visible your flaws become.

quotes.patois: Yuh haffi soak before yuh dry
quotes.english: You must go through difficulties before finding relief.

quotes.patois: If yuh nuh have dog, run wid cat
quotes.english: Make the best of what you have.

quotes.patois: When breeze blow, fowl feather fly
quotes.english: When trouble comes, people's true nature is revealed.

quotes.patois: Nuh wait fi drum fi beat fi dance
quotes.english: Don't wait for the perfect moment — start now.

quotes.patois: Come yah, mek wi reason
quotes.english: Come, let's talk it through and understand each other.

quotes.patois: Wen yuh hand inna lion mouth, tek time draw it out
quotes.english: When you're in a tough spot, proceed carefully.

quotes.patois: Di darkest part a night is just before daylight
quotes.english: The hardest times come right before things get better.

quotes.patois: Mind sharp like cutlass
quotes.english: Stay mentally sharp and alert.

quotes.patois: Peace a di foundation
quotes.english: Everything good is built on a foundation of peace.

quotes.patois: Yuh life a yuh own fi live
quotes.english: Your life is yours to live — don't let others dictate it.

quotes.patois: Nuh put yuh cart before yuh horse
quotes.english: Don't rush ahead — do things in the right order.

quotes.patois: Every dog have dem day
quotes.english: Everyone will have their moment of success.

quotes.patois: Patient man ride donkey
quotes.english: Patience will carry you further than rushing.

quotes.patois: Play fool fi ketch wise
quotes.english: Sometimes pretending you don't know gets you the best results.

quotes.patois: Nuh every grin a laugh
quotes.english: Not every smile is genuine.

quotes.patois: Yuh strong like lion
quotes.english: You have great inner strength.

quotes.patois: Nuh badda fret
quotes.english: Don't worry about it — things will work out.

quotes.patois: Mek haste slowly
quotes.english: Move with purpose but don't rush recklessly.

quotes.patois: Yuh caan please everybody
quotes.english: You can't make everyone happy, so focus on yourself.

quotes.patois: New broom sweep clean but old broom know di corners
quotes.english: New things are exciting, but experience has its own value.

quotes.patois: Before yuh cross di road, look both ways
quotes.english: Think carefully before making important decisions.

quotes.patois: Nuh follow crowd if crowd a go ova cliff
quotes.english: Don't follow others blindly into bad decisions.

quotes.patois: Di fruit nuh fall far from di tree
quotes.english: Children often reflect their parents' nature.

quotes.patois: Yuh light a shine bright
quotes.english: Your potential and spirit are radiant.

quotes.patois: Tek life easy
quotes.english: Don't stress yourself — take things at a comfortable pace.

quotes.patois: River nuh run uphill
quotes.english: Things follow their natural course; don't fight what's natural.

quotes.patois: Empty barrel mek di most noise
quotes.english: Those with the least substance often talk the most.

quotes.patois: Yuh future bright like di sun
quotes.english: Great things are ahead of you.

quotes.patois: Everyting inna life a fi a reason
quotes.english: Everything in life happens for a reason.

quotes.patois: When one door shut, another one open
quotes.english: When one opportunity ends, another begins.

quotes.patois: Nuh count yuh chicken before dem hatch
quotes.english: Don't assume success before it actually happens.

quotes.patois: Yuh cyaan siddung pon cow back an cuss cow skin
quotes.english: Don't insult someone while benefiting from them.

quotes.patois: Di best revenge a success
quotes.english: The best way to respond to haters is by thriving.

quotes.patois: Calm sea nuh mek good sailor
quotes.english: Easy times don't build strong character.

quotes.patois: Yuh spirit a di compass
quotes.english: Let your inner spirit guide your direction in life.

quotes.patois: Who feel it, know it
quotes.english: Only those who experience something truly understand it.

quotes.patois: Yuh nuh need permission fi shine
quotes.english: You don't need anyone's approval to be great.

quotes.patois: What nuh kill yuh, mek yuh strong
quotes.english: Hardships make you stronger.

quotes.patois: Talk truth an shame di devil
quotes.english: Speaking the truth is always the right thing to do.

quotes.patois: Easy squeeze nuh ketch flea
quotes.english: Being too gentle won't get tough things done.

quotes.patois: Nuff a dem a smile but heart nuh clean
quotes.english: Many people smile at you but don't have good intentions.

quotes.patois: Yuh worth more dan gold
quotes.english: Your value is beyond measure.

quotes.patois: Hand go, packet come
quotes.english: What you give out comes back to you.

quotes.patois: One hand caan clap
quotes.english: You need cooperation and teamwork to accomplish things.

quotes.patois: Nuh tek sleep fi mark death
quotes.english: Don't underestimate a situation or person.

quotes.patois: Di ting bout life is fi keep going
quotes.english: The key to life is to keep moving forward.

quotes.patois: Yuh blessed beyond measure
quotes.english: You are more blessed than you even realize.

quotes.patois: Nuh mek nobody dim yuh light
quotes.english: Don't let anyone diminish your spirit.

quotes.patois: Breeze blow but tree nuh fall
quotes.english: Troubles may come, but you remain standing.

quotes.patois: Gratitude a di best attitude
quotes.english: Being thankful is the best mindset to have.

quotes.patois: Yuh a warrior, nuh victim
quotes.english: You are a fighter, not someone who gives up.

quotes.patois: Mek peace wid yuh past
quotes.english: Find closure with your past to move forward freely.

quotes.patois: Nuh rush di process
quotes.english: Don't hurry things — trust the journey.

quotes.patois: Yuh purpose a no accident
quotes.english: You were made for a reason — your life has meaning.

quotes.patois: Joyful heart mek good medicine
quotes.english: A happy heart is the best remedy for any trouble.

iconicQuotes.author: Bob Marley
iconicQuotes.text: The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to affect those around him positively.

iconicQuotes.author: Marcus Garvey
iconicQuotes.text: A people without the knowledge of their past history, origin and culture is like a tree without roots.

iconicQuotes.author: Miss Lou
iconicQuotes.text: Cock mouth kill cock. (Be careful of what you say).

iconicQuotes.author: Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce
iconicQuotes.text: Whatever the goal is, just stay focused and keep working.

iconicQuotes.author: Bob Marley
iconicQuotes.text: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.

iconicQuotes.author: Marcus Garvey
iconicQuotes.text: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.

iconicQuotes.author: Bob Marley
iconicQuotes.text: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.

iconicQuotes.author: Marcus Garvey
iconicQuotes.text: Emancipate yourselves from mental slavery. None but ourselves can free our minds.

iconicQuotes.author: Bob Marley
iconicQuotes.text: Don't gain the world and lose your soul; wisdom is better than silver and gold.

iconicQuotes.author: Usain Bolt
iconicQuotes.text: Worrying gets you nowhere. If you turn up worrying about how you're going to perform, you've already lost.

iconicQuotes.author: Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce
iconicQuotes.text: The road to success is not always smooth, but with perseverance you can get there.

iconicQuotes.author: Bob Marley
iconicQuotes.text: Better to die fighting for freedom then be a prisoner all the days of your life.

iconicQuotes.author: Marcus Garvey
iconicQuotes.text: With confidence, you have won before you have started.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
bibleAffirmations.patois: De Lawd a mi shepherd; mi nah go want fi nuttn.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Mi can do every single ting tru Christ weh gi mi di strength.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Mi a go look up a di hill dem; dats weh mi help a come fram.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Truss di Lawd wid all a yuh heart; nuh rely pon wah yuh tink yuh know.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Tan up strong an nuh fret; cause di Lawd deh wid yuh.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Wi know seh everyting work out fi di good fi dem weh love God.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the Lord, thoughts of peace, and not of evil.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Di Lawd seh: Mi know di plans mi have fi yuh — plans fi bless yuh, not fi harm yuh.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Nuh fraid; mi deh wid yuh. Nuh worry; mi a yuh God.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: Be still, and know that I am God.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Tan still an know seh mi a God.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Come to mi, all a unnu weh tired an carry heavy load, an mi wi gi unnu rest.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?
bibleAffirmations.patois: Di Lawd a mi light an mi salvation; who mi fi fraid?

bibleAffirmations.kjv: Commit thy works unto the Lord, and thy thoughts shall be established.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Put yuh works inna di Lawd hands, an yuh plans wi set firm.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: Be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Nuh follow di ways a di world; mek yuh mind get brand new an transform.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Dem weh stay close to di Most High a go rest under di Almighty shadow.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: But they that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Dem weh wait pon di Lawd a go get new strength; dem a go fly high like eagle.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: Delight thyself also in the Lord; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Tek joy inna di Lawd, an Him a go gi yuh wah yuh heart desire.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
bibleAffirmations.patois: God nuh gi wi nuh spirit of fear — Him gi wi power, love, an a sound mind.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: This is the day which the Lord hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Dis a di day weh di Lawd mek; mek wi happy an glad inna it.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Nuh get tired a do good; when di time right, yuh a go reap if yuh nuh give up.

bibleAffirmations.kjv: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
bibleAffirmations.patois: Nuh worry bout nuttn; but inna everyting, pray an give thanks an tell God wah yuh need.
